name: City.Scape()
description:
City.Scape() is a game where you create a small city-scape from a set of 'buildings' available to you and a few good clicks of the mouse. When you're satisfied or tired of what you've done, hit the Camera to capture a screenshot of your hard work, and hit the Big X to quit to the main menu. It's that simple!

Curious to know what something does while playing? Try clicking on it!

There's a devlog for this game! Check it out.
